entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023
